api_errors.WORKSPACE_DB_CONNECTION_ERROR: Connection to the custom database failed. Please check your credentials and try again.
api_errors.WORKSPACE_DB_OUTDATED_MIGRATION: The custom database schema is outdated. Please contact us so that we can apply the missing migrations.
api_errors.USER_CREATE_UNKNOWN_TENANT: This tenant is unknown. Please check that you selected a valid tenant.
api_errors.USER_CREATE_ALREADY_EXISTS: A user with the same email address already exists on this tenant.
api_errors.UNKNOWN_ERROR: An unknown error has occured. It's probably an issue on our side. We'll investigate the situation.
api_errors.USER_FIELD_SLUG_ALREADY_EXISTS: A field with this slug already exists.
api_errors.PERMISSION_CREATE_CODENAME_ALREADY_EXIST: A permission already exists with this codename. A codename must be unique within your workspace.
api_errors.PERMISSION_UPDATE_CODENAME_ALREADY_EXIST: A permission already exists with this codename. A codename must be unique within your workspace.
api_errors.USER_ROLE_CREATE_ALREADY_ADDED_ROLE: This role has already been granted to this user.
api_errors.USER_PERMISSION_CREATE_ALREADY_ADDED_PER: This permission has already been granted to this user.

tenant_combobox.no_matching_tenant: No tenant is matching your query.

permission_combobox.no_matching_permission: No permission is matching your query.

role_combobox.no_matching_role: No role is matching your query.
